about_the_game:
Nature is in danger!
A mysterious toxic smoke rises from the underground, corrupting nature and turning the island’s creatures into hostile and aggressive beings.

Defend your village and protect your new home by battling corrupted creatures, exploring the island, and venturing into the deep underground labyrinths. Uncover the origin of the poisonous fumes and put an end to the threat endangering the entire island!

Get ready for an adventure filled with action, mystery, and exploration!

  • An RPG, Top-Down adventure game Begin your adventure on a lush, remote island. Fight, explore, and uncover its hidden secrets! Encounter fascinating characters and unravel the mysteries threatening the island’s safety.

  • Real time combat gameplay

    Traverse forests, beaches, and caves as you search every corner of the island. Discover powerful weapons and descend into the earth’s depths to face increasingly dangerous creatures.
    In several areas, enemies respawn randomly ! (similar to Rogue-like)

  • Meet Unique Characters

    Interact with a diverse cast, each with their own backstory and personality, enhancing your gameplay with rich and memorable encounters.

  • A Stunning 2D Pixel Art World

    Immerse yourself in beautifully crafted pixel art that brings the game’s natural environments to life. Each scenario is teeming with unique creatures and slimes, making every area a delight to explore.

  • Side Quests and Minigames

    From charming cats to engaging minigames, a variety of side quests offer hours of entertainment and diverse gameplay to keep you captivated.

short_description: Big Boy Adventure is a story-driven, single-player RPG. Embark on an epic journey starting on a small island, where you'll assist villagers by completing their requests. Explore mysterious anomalies on the island and engage in battles with creatures that display increasingly unusual behavior.
